LanguageData.SK.noprisonersympathy.ModSettings.organH: Factions don't care about organ harvesting (Requires restart)
When enabled, a patch will be applied to remove all negative goodwill attained from organ harvesting.
LanguageData.SK.noprisonersympathy.ModSettings.affect: Instead of completely disabling negative thoughts, reduce their impact by a percentage
LanguageData.SK.noprisonersympathy.ModSettings.moodRe: Percentage to reduce negative mood penalties by (0% = no reduction, 100% = complete removal)
